name: Poopclicker
description:
Poop Clicker! (It's a game?)

Click your way to the unlimited amount of poop!
Gain more and more poop and become the greatest poop maker in the world
and then in the universe!
(Please note that this game might make your daily life seem
disturbingly awkward and useless.)

There are currently 7 upgrades,
Cursor
Butt
Public Toilet
Poop Condenser (P. Condenser)
Toilet Tardis
Poop Facility
Nuclear Poop Plant (Nuclear P. Plant)
Information about the upgrades can be found at the forum topic.

The game is complete, there are just some bugs to fix!
PM me if you find any bugs or just report them on the forums.

Click here to discuss "Poop Clicker" on the forums.

This game is now also available in your webbrowser thanks to Tonkku107!

Would like to mention that the serial code is to prevent some malicious users from uploading this on other distribution platforms.
